summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3575, for the improvement of West 62nd Street, from 37th Avenue Northwest to a point 310 feet east of 34th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 44164, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
